summary: Diff appears to address the transparency issue by adding explicit opaque background utility classes to TaskCard and task-related dialog content surfaces. Some additional non-requested metadata/documentation updates are also present.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to internal project tracking metadata (new_feature_requests/status entries) not requested in the BuildRequest.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for UI transparency fixes; it does not mention maintaining/updating project_state.json tracking fields.

hallucinated_features.description: Updates to the repository-wide frontend file summaries containing many unrelated feature descriptions (boot orchestration, auth recovery flows, field background color variables, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: These summary/documentation updates are not requested by the BuildRequest, which is narrowly scoped to task card and task modal opacity.
